amendment.description: Amendment requires States to establish a cost containment system for the procurement of infant formulas under the Family Nutrition Block Grant Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require states to establish a cost containment system for the procurement of infant formulas, to apply those savings to the purposes of the Family Nutrition Block Grant, and to report to Congress on the cost containment system and the savings realized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
